description.value:
Trigger A creature touches the door directly or with a tool

Effect The ward's equations spiral and swirl, drawing the mind into an inescapable conundrum. The triggering creature is dealt @Damage[(4d10+26)[mental]] damage (@Check[will|dc:32|basic] save). On a failure, the target is additionally @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 2}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied]{Stupefied 4} on a critical failure.

details.description: A complex geometrical ward with mathematical equations woven into its lines magically seals the door, harming anyone who touches it.
details.disable: @Check[thievery|dc:30] (master) to sabotage the ward, Geometry or @Check[25-lore|dc:Mathematics]{Mathematics Lore} (trained) to calculate the solution to the complex equations, @Check[crafting|dc:28] (expert) to manipulate the ward's precise underlying schematics, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dispel Magic] (4th rank; counteract DC 26) to counteract the magical ward

publication.title: Pathfinder #215: To Blot Out the Sun

details.reset: The trap automatically resets after being triggered. If disabled, the ward does not reset.
